To,
The Manager,
Druk PNB Bank Ltd.
Thimphu,
 
Subject: Release Of Fund.

Dear Sir/Madam, 

Kindly arrange to execute the Telephonic Transfer as per the following details:

  • Bank application Reference No.: {{doc.bank_app_ref_no}}
  • Vendor Invoice No.: {{doc.vendor_invoice_no}}
    • {% if doc.final_payment == 1 %}
  • Final payment : {{ doc.declaration_reference_no }}
    • {% endif %}
  • Beneficiary Name : {{doc.supplier_name}}
  • Bank Name : {{doc.bank_name}}
  • Bank Branch : {{doc.bank_branch }}
  • Account Number : {{ doc.bank_account_number }}
  • IFSC Code : {{doc.ifsc_code}}
  • Amount to transfer: INR. {{ frappe.format_value((doc.total_credit), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}({{(frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.total_credit))[3:] }} )
The RTGS Amount and the Telephonic Transfer Charges can be debited from CD account No. 110210026830
Thanking You.
Yours faithfully,
